title: United States Marshall Service  PARNELL MCNAMARA MIKE MCNAMARA

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

US Marshall Service Request




I am not requesting any identifying information only the following information.

Request Service dates and Duty Stations or Locations Served for Thomas Parnell McNamara Sr, Thomas Parnell McNamara Jr., and Michael Patrick McNamara with the US Marshall Service or The Federal District Court In Waco Texas

 

Ranks achieved during time of their service for Thomas Parnell McNamara Sr, Thomas Parnell McNamara Jr., and Michael Patrick McNamara with the US Marshall Service or The Federal District Court In Waco Texas

Any accommodations for Thomas Parnell McNamara Sr, Thomas Parnell McNamara Jr., and Michael Patrick McNamara with the US Marshall Service or The Federal District Court In Waco Texas

Any Certifications for each Thomas Parnell McNamara Sr, Thomas Parnell McNamara Jr., and Michael Patrick McNamara with the US Marshall Service or The Federal District Court In Waco Texas

Specialized Training or awards Thomas Parnell McNamara Sr, Thomas Parnell McNamara Jr., and Michael Patrick McNamara with the US Marshall Service or The Fed

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman.....Employee Number Comparison

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

#1

 

Need number of employees at the McLennan County Jail during each yearly period.

 

January the 1st 2013 until December 31st, 2013

 

January the 1st 2014 until December 31st, 2014

 

January the 1st 2015 until December 31st, 2015

 

January the 1st 2016 until December 31st, 2016

 

January the 1st 2017 until December 31st, 2017

 

January the 1st 2018 until December 31st, 2018

 

January the 1st 2019 until December 31st, 2019, to include the takeover the Jack Harwell Detention Center in September 2019

 

January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020

 

January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021

 

January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022

 

January the 1st 2023 until October 20, 2023

 

#2

 

Revenue from Jack Harwell Detention Center Yearly

 

October 1st, 2019, through December 31st, 2019

 

January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020

 

January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021

 

January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022

 

January the 1st 2023 until October 20th, 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
